rbadia.voidspace.model
Class Item

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
          java.awt.Rectangle
              rbadia.voidspace.model.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Item
extends java.awt.Rectangle

Represents the items that will fall from when an multiple-life asteroid is destroyed. Includes a laser gun, a shotgun with multiple bullets, extra life.

Author:
Daniel Santigao & Nataira Pag‡n
